message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale for $10000. It's a one-time opportunity, and you won't find this deal anywhere else. I believe in the quality of my products, and I'm sure you'll be happy with your purchase. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I'd like to see some sales data before I make a decision.  I'd feel more comfortable buying if I knew there was a track record of high-quality products being sold.
